mapper.select: SELECT DONG_NO FROM "DONG" JOIN "SIGUNGU" USING (SIGUNGU_NO) JOIN "DOSI" USING (DOSI_NO) WHERE REPLACE(DONG_NAME, ' ', '') LIKE '%' || REPLACE(#{dongName}, ' ', '') || '%' AND REPLACE(SIGUNGU_NAME, ' ', '') LIKE '%' || REPLACE(#{sigunguName}, ' ', '') || '%' AND REPLACE(DOSI_NAME, ' ', '') LIKE '%' || REPLACE(#{dosiName}, ' ', '') || '%'

SELECT DOSI_NAME || ' ' || (CASE WHEN LENGTH(SIGUNGU_NAME) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(SIGUNGU_NAME, 1, 3) || ' ' || SUBSTR(SIGUNGU_NAME, 4) ELSE SIGUNGU_NAME END) || ' ' || DONG_NAME FROM "DONG" JOIN "SIGUNGU" USING (SIGUNGU_NO) JOIN "DOSI" USING (DOSI_NO) WHERE DONG_NO = #{dongNo}
SELECT * FROM "APPLY_HIRE" LEFT JOIN "HIRE" USING (HIRE_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} ORDER BY HIRE_NO DESC
